Instantly.AddIRCMessage: @Channel now the tower's case is closed, and it's fires shine a light!
The sacrilegious and recalcitrant shall vow or face the smite!
The hell are you talking about?
My sweet summer child, haven't you understood it all already?
You have just pulled off the scariest hit ever on a corporation to this day.
While listening to a fanatic, @Akamanto have organized and @Pretence pulled off a DDoS attack on Jintech's precious megatower
And took extra step not to just set their servers on fire, but disable any fire prevention and evacuation systems!
You've made their doomsday a thing! They'll get the coiled rope and go down for you, but I'm curious for how long you can hide.
And thus, I give you all an escape route. Go forth and entertain me in your last weeks, I'll be watching.
